content: {"name": "Zion AME Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Must call ahead to set appointments with the reverent (+1 (267) 258-8709) and the way forwad will be provided with regards to time to go receive food.\n* Located at CORNER 21ST AND Tasker Street (big gray Church) but further directions can be requested after setting appointment dates", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1600 South 21st Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Point Breeze", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19145", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9318289, "longitude": -75.1801186}, "phones": [{"number": "(267) 258-8709", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
